Question: Can you please provide the specific date of your last year birthday so I can look up the scores of the football matches for that day?

In order to provide the results about the football matches played on your last year's birthday, I need the specific date of when your last birthday occurred. Please provide the date in format YYYY-MM-DD (for example, 2021-07-21). Then I'll be able to fetch the football match scores for that day!
Due to the limitation of toolset, I cannot solve the question.
